meanings.definition: Extremely convenient or easy to use.
meanings.sent1: The new app is ultraconvenient for ordering food with just a few taps.
meanings.sent2: Having a microwave in the office kitchen is ultraconvenient for heating up leftovers.
meanings.sent3: It was ultraconvenient that the store was right next to the gas station when I needed to fill up.
meanings.sent4: Her backpack with wheels was like an ultraconvenient little helper, making travel a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The ultraconvenient express checkout lane saved me so much time during the busy shopping season.

meanings.definition: Going beyond what is usual or ordinary in terms of convenience.
meanings.sent1: The hotel's ultraconvenient shuttle service took guests directly to the theme park entrance.
meanings.sent2: The ultraconvenient self-checkout machines made grocery shopping a quick and easy experience.
meanings.sent3: It was ultraconvenient how the automatic doors opened just as we approached, like magic.
meanings.sent4: The ultraconvenient online booking system made planning our trip effortless and stress-free.
meanings.sent5: The ultraconvenient drive-thru pharmacy allowed customers to pick up prescriptions without leaving their cars.
